programme.title: São Paulo, Brazil
programme.desc: The world's craziest and most creative four-wheeled race went to Brazil in 2019 and this is what happened.

programme.title: Tokyo, Japan
programme.desc: Creativity reaches new heights at the 2019 Red Bull Soapbox Race in Tokyo, Japan.

programme.title: Best of Red Bull Soapbox Race vol. 2
programme.desc: Check out the best moments of Red Bull Soapbox Race, from the driving skills to the high speed spills.

programme.title: Cincinnati, Ohio
programme.desc: Thousands gather in Cincinnati, Ohio to witness these wacky contraptions compete downhill against gravity.

programme.title: Johannesburg, South Africa
programme.desc: South Africa's most innovative and witty teams race each other down the twists and turns of Sandton Drive.

programme.title: Lisbon, Portugal
programme.desc: The steep inclines of Lisbon, Portugal, played a perfect host to Red Bull Soapbox Race.

programme.title: Rome, Italy
programme.desc: Rome is about to show a different side of itself as Red Bull Soapbox Race gets started in this location.

programme.title: Mumbai, India
programme.desc: Thousands of frenzied fans swarmed to Mumbai, India, to watch brave soapbox racers compete all day and night.

programme.title: Santiago, Chile
programme.desc: Teams of intrepid soapbox racers test their skills in Santiago, Chile, on a steep and treacherous course.

programme.title: Best of Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Look back on 20 years of the Red Bull Soapbox Race with a collection of best moments from the crazy contest.

programme.title: Cork, Ireland
programme.desc: Creative and crazy competitors from the British Isles converge on Cork, Ireland for the Red Bull Soapbox Race.

programme.title: Louisville, USA
programme.desc: Forty teams try to avoid dropping into the Ohio River by piloting inventive homemade flying machines.

programme.title: Varna, Bulgaria
programme.desc: A crowd of 20,000 welcomes teams of amateur aviators who will attempt to fly on the coast of the Black Sea.

programme.title: Boston, USA
programme.desc: A strong headwind challenges the weird and wonderful flying machines in one of America's great academic cities.

programme.title: Hong Kong
programme.desc: Some of the world’s most creative aircraft soar at Victoria Harbour in Hong Kong for Red Bull Flugtag.

programme.title: Zurich, Switzerland
programme.desc: Fifty teams fly homemade flying craft around (and in!) Lake Zurich, Switzerland.

programme.title: Atlanta, USA
programme.desc: It’s one of the steepest, fastest courses ever, with a big jump to test the durability of every soapbox car.

programme.title: Auckland, New Zealand
programme.desc: This is one of the most difficult tracks in Soapbox Race history, requiring durability and manoeuvrability.

programme.title: Barcelona, Spain
programme.desc: Drivers and soapbox cars alike are tested by a lengthy course full of sweeping turns and mid-track obstacles.

programme.title: Cincinnati, USA
programme.desc: Determined soapbox racers unveil their zany creations and face off against Cincinnati’s winding race course.

programme.title: London, England
programme.desc: Courageous racers take London by storm as they steer their homemade soapbox cars through a perilous course.

programme.title: Montreal, Canada
programme.desc: It's chaos in Canada as hairbrained homebrewed racecars blast through a turbulent track in downtown Montreal.

programme.title: Valkenburg, Holland
programme.desc: The action is off to a blistering start as these fearless Dutch drivers zoom down Holland’s steepest road.

programme.title: Oslo, Norway
programme.desc: Local flavours rule the day, as teams dress up homemade flying machines in honour of food, festivals and more.

programme.title: Portland, USA
programme.desc: The influence of past winners is evident as a new generation of homemade flying machines takes to the skies.
